data.question: Click on the actions you should take when confronted by an aggressive driver.
answers: Don’t allow yourself to be drawn into a confrontation
Make an obscene gesture back when they yell at you
Avoid eye contact with the road rage driver
Try to get in front of them to slow and calm them down
Stay as far behind the road rage driver as possible
Get out of the way of the road rage driver
Call the police and don’t get out of your car
If you’ve done something wrong to anger another driver, try to gesture that you are sorry
